data.title: Guide to the Cultivation Licensing System (CLS) for Applicants and Licensees Introduction and Overview
data.excerpt: Introduction The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) oversees two separate cannabis licensing systems. This is a guide to the Cultivation Licensing System (CLS). In this document, we will show you how to register with the licensing system, set up your account, and apply for a cannabis cultivation license. In addition, this guide will include how […]
